授業目的: This course seeks to understand the history of postwar Japan on politics, diplomacy, economy, society, and culture. Based on these lecture, we will discuss a story of postwar Japanese history.

トピック.授業外学習2:
In preparation for this class, please study the basic knowledge of Japanese political history in reference books. Also, in preparation for writing the action paper, please do some research on the case specified in the case.
On the last day, presentations will be made by the participants. Students will select one topic on Japanese politics and report on (1) the description of the topic, (2) the topic's position in Japanese politics, and (3) its subsequent impact. The reporting time is scheduled to be 30 minutes. Presentation time will vary depending on the number of participants.
